chat_history.message:
Hello, my iPhone 12 Pro has a problem:

Good morning, the order still doesn't have a delivery date and it should've arrived by now. Is there any way to find out when it will arrive? I need to return another one that I bought because of a screen issue and days are passing…
Thank you,

Hello!

The tracking status of this order has not changed in 4 business days and is now considered lost as per Back Market delivery policy. We have requested the Back Market certificate of non-receipt and picture of the customers ID to arrange a refund or a replacement.

Once all the paperwork has been gathered we’ll let you know if the customer prefers a refund or a reshipment. The deadline is 24 hours from reception of the documents

If at any point the delivery begins to move again a refund will not be issued and the order is considered to be late.

Best regards,
Maria - Back Market

Hello!

The parcel has not been successfully delivered yet and all the requirements for a refund as described by our lost parcel policy have been fulfilled. Any and all relevant paperwork has been attached to this message.

You can use the attached documents to investigate the matter with your delivery company

Please send a tracking link for a replacement within 24 hours or this order will be refunded

You can now blacklist the device.

Best regards,
Maria - Back Market

Dear Backcare,

Thank you for the documents. We will contact our logistics partner. In the meantime, please do not refund the customer. Thank you for your patience and understanding.

Regards,
AS

Hi ecomobile,

Just a friendly reminder that the customer is waiting for their >>new device<<.

Remember, the customer does not have to wait until the investigate finish.

Please send the new device and send us a valid tracking link and the carrier name, sends the new IMEI as well within 1 business day. Remember that if you do not send a valid tracking link in a message to us, it is as if you did not send it since we can not verify, and according to the QC, we have to refund.

We have listed some issues with their corresponding resolutions here in case these are preventing you from carrying out the refund. Please use the "Report a Problem" button on the bottom of the screen to declare an issue with the customer's return and stop a refund from being made on your behalf.

1. In case of a delivery issue: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-transport-issue-lost-stolen-damaged-parcel

2. In case of a user account (e.g. iCloud, Google) still connected: 
iCloud: 
https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/What-to-do-with-a-device-locked-to-iCloud

Google: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-product-blocked-with-an-account-Android-Google

3. In case of a warranty exclusion: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/Declare-and-manage-warranty-exclusion

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Maria Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare,

We have forwarded the relevant documents to our logistics partner and await confirmation that the parcel is truly lost. In the meantime, please confirm the customer's address:

Noemí Aldana Vilalta
C/ de l'alfàbrega, 14, 2-2
43206 Reus
Spain
644 24 26 17

We will check if we have sufficient stock to send a replacement.

Regards,
RK

Dear ecomobile

I hope you are having a great day, This is Maria from Back Market.

The customer confirms her address:

Noemí Aldana Vilalta
C/ de l’alfàbrega, 14, 2-2
Reus - 43206
644242617

Please send it within 1 business day.

Thanks so much for your assistance, we wait for your reply. 

Regards,
Maria from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We take note of the customer's address, we will update you soon.

Regards,
JY
